entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending overnight then cloudy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023
